mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MARKET_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO, MARKET_NO, USER_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MARKET_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{marketNo}, #{userId}, #{commentContent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_NO commentNo, C.MARKET_NO marketNo, C.USER_ID userId, C.COMMENT_CONTENT commentContent, C.COMMENT_DATE commentDate, U.USER_NAME userName FROM TB_MARKET_COMMENT C JOIN TB_USER U ON C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE C.MARKET_NO = #{marketNo} ORDER BY C.COMMENT_DATE ASC
